Question: Who can create the Order
Answers: 1.Order can be created by any application user (FR to HO).

Question: Customer Not Eligible for Order
Answers: As per policy customer should be approved by channel Manager, please check the enrollment status by referring single customer information

Question: What are the Mandatory conditions for Order creation
Answers: Enrollment Status : Customer should be approved by Channel Manager
Shop Registration Copy : If Cumulative order value for the month is > 50K
GSTN : If Cumulative order value for the month is > 1 Lac

Question: How Order logic works
Answers: Order to be collect on 13 digit part No. however supply for calculation is on 10 digit

Question: Is GSTN is mandatory for Order
Answers: 1. Yes GSTN is mandatory If Cumulative order value for the month is > 1 Lac

Question: What is the meaning of Auto Order
Answers: 1. Auto Order generated by system after completion of month in case of BRO and after completion of Quarter in case of Hi10.
System generated the Order for eligible Parts if conditions are fulfilled by customers as below :
Minimum 1 Mark visit by linked FR in Month (in case of BRO) and in Quarter (in case of Hi10).

Shop Registration copy is mandatory incase cumulative order value (Inclosing Auto Order) is greater than 50K GSTN is mandatory incase cumulative order value (Inclosing Auto Order) is greater than 1 Lac. Enrollment status should be approved by Channel Manager

Question: Who can submit the Auto Order and in what period
Answers: 1. Auto Order can submit by respective BMD from Portal. Within 5 days auto order can be submit after secondary closing date
